content: Interesting exercise: with 43 moves, Black captures all of 25 white stones arranged in 4 groups (3+9+8+5) on the board.
translations: ita:Esercizio interessanteï¹• con 43 mosse, il Nero cattura tutte le pietre bianche (25) disposte in 4 gruppi (3+9+8+5) sul ta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
